title.narrative: Promoting social stabilization through entrepreneurship development for youth in north-eastern Nigeria

description.narrative: The project aims to enhance social stabilisation and economic resilience among youth in northeastern Nigeria through entrepreneurship education. By providing trade and entrepreneurial competencies, the project increases youth employability, as well as encourages self-employment through youth-initiated businesses and enterprises. In coordination with the Nigerian Educational and Research Development Council (NERDC), UNIDO has developed a revised trade and entr epreneurship curricula to be implemented at senior secondary schools. The project is supporting the piloting and implementation of the revised curricula at six schools in three northeastern states in Nigeria # Bauchi, Adamawa and Gombe. Upon successful completion of the pilot, UNIDO aims to roll out the programme nationally.
